title: HOW TO SMOOTH AND LEVEL A BUMPY FIELD OR LAWN

tasks.task: Level a bumpy lawn or field using a tiller and rake
subtasks: Assess the area to be leveled for sod and organic matter
Choose appropriate tools for the job, such as a tiller and rake
Clear the area of large debris, such as stumps, using a stump wrecker if necessary
Use a tiller to break up the soil and sod clumps consistently across the area multiple times
Use a dethatcher or landscape rake to gather remaining sod clumps, sticks, and debris to one side
Rake the area with a long-grade rake to achieve a level surface
Adjust to the desired levelness, especially for pastures or lawns
Seed the leveled area in appropriate conditions, such as after a rain or during favorable weather
Cover the seed with a light layer using the rake
Apply water and fertilizer as needed for germination

tasks.task: Apply safety products for agricultural equipment, such as RimGuard Solutions
subtasks: Learn about liquid ballast weights that prevent rear tires from lifting
Understand benefits like improved traction and safety for agricultural vehicles
Locate dealerships and product information through RimGuardSolutions.com

tasks.task: Source necessary farming tools and equipment
subtasks: Visit GoodWorksTractors.com for tools such as sprayers, tillers, rakes, and seeders
Contact the vendor for customized recommendations based on project specifics
Purchase and set up the right tools for the job to ensure efficiency and safety

tasks.task: Level a bumpy lawn or field using a tiller and rake.
So, one MAINTASK and several subtasks under it, then another MAINTASK for the safety product and equipment sourcing. That seems comprehensive.
Level a bumpy lawn or field using a tiller and rake
subtasks: Clear large debris (stumps) with a stump wrecker
Assess the area's condition, checking for sod, weeds, and organic matter
Use a tiller to break up the sod clumps across the entire area multiple times
Gather remaining sod clumps and debris using a dethatcher or landscape rake
Use a long-grade rake to achieve a level surface
Time seeding based on weather conditions (e.g., wait for rain or fall planting)
Use a seeder to broadcast seed over the leveled area
Lightly cover the seed with the rake, then apply water and fertilizer

tasks.task: Apply RimGuard Solutions to agricultural tires to improve safety and traction
subtasks: Learn about liquid ballast weights and their benefits
Locate dealerships and product information through RimGuardSolutions.com

tasks.task: Source necessary farming tools and equipment from GoodWorksTractors.com
subtasks: Visit GoodWorksTractors.com to find tools like sprayers, tillers, rakes, and seeders
Contact the vendor for customized recommendations based on project specifics
Purchase and set up the right tools for the job to ensure efficiency and safety
